title: Looking for a team - G3 solo- Main supp
body: Title pretty much explains it, Would love to have a team to play with am currently G3 and my main is supp altho i can play adc and mid too

replies.body:
i am gold 3 as well but 98LP almost promo for gold 2 :D


... again :(
Hi there, I am currently in the process of forming a semi serious team. I have sent an add!
